Text:
This is a great film.  Too bad about the subtitle situation.

Tom Waits scored the movie...that's worth mentioning, too.

this sure is a great movie, but with no subs...
well, to all the Finns who speak English & Italian (no one speaks Finnish as a foreign language): enjoy the movie :D
There are a lot of subtitles (including english) for this movie here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/search/sublanguageid-all/idmovie-1341
Thanks! And the last mentioned subs work perfect!
Ah just what I needed after the horrible double of Max Payne and Righteous Kill. Some goodness to wash away the bad.

For anybody wanting to watch this movie in english the download is definitely worthwhile but I was suprised to see the later parts of the film which are all naturally subtitled aren't hardsubbed in this version, fortunately though the link provided by AnotherStranger does fix this problem.  thanks for the up lascruces!

Thanks 4 Sharing Lascruces ...   AND

Thanks AnotherStranger 4 the SubTitles !!!

guys, this is an amazing example of how the pirates bay rules... i live in toronto and watched this movie years ago and was really moved by it, now i can enjoy this and the subs in two easy clicks..
 gentlemen.. you rock ..
many thanks ..mdcc
